name: Trello
description: Visual collaboration and project management tool using boards, lists, and cards to organize tasks and workflows for teams and individuals.

name: SeatGeek
description: Mobile-focused ticket platform that enables users to buy and sell tickets for live sports, concerts, and theater events.

name: MongoDB
description: Developer of a leading general-purpose, document-based database platform, offering cloud and on-premises solutions for scalable data management.

name: Etsy
description: Global online marketplace specializing in unique, handmade, vintage, and creative goods from independent sellers.

name: Codecademy
description: Online interactive learning platform offering coding classes in various programming languages for beginners and professionals.

name: Kickstarter
description: Crowdfunding platform enabling creators to raise funds for creative projects in art, music, technology, and more.

name: Peloton
description: Fitness technology company offering connected exercise equipment and subscription-based interactive workout classes.

address: 225 Varick Street, 12th Floor, New York, NY 10014
description: All-in-one website building and hosting platform providing tools for creating professional websites, online stores, and portfolios.

name: Zocdoc
description: Online healthcare marketplace allowing patients to find doctors, book appointments, and access telehealth services.

name: Vimeo
address: 330 West 34th Street, 5th Floor, New York, NY 10001
